sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Col, Row} from "react-bootstrap"; import Header from '../components/header'; import Footer from '../components/footer'; import { Navigate, useLocation, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect } from "react"; const BookingData = () =>{ const location = useLocation(); const history = useNavigate() if(location.state) { const data = location.state; const months = ["January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December"]; const d = new Date(data.trip_date); let month = months[d.getMonth()]; const year = d.getFullYear(); const day = d.getDate() const [booking, setBooking] = useState([ { fullname: '', age: '', sex: '', seat_no: '' } ]) return( <>

Booking Details

From {data.trip_from}
To {data.trip_to}
Date/Time {month} {day}, {year} { new Date(data.trip_time).getHours() >11 ? new Date(data.trip_time).getHours() +':'+ new Date(data.trip_time).getMinutes() + 'PM' : new Date(data.trip_time).getHours() +':'+ new Date(data.trip_time).getMinutes() + 'AM' }
Shuttle {data.vehicle_name}
Seat No {data.seats.join(', ')}

Fare Details

Ticket Fare: N {(data.total_fare).toLocaleString()}
Grand Total: N {(data.total_fare).toLocaleString()}
Payable Amount: N {(data.total_fare).toLocaleString()}
Passenger Details { data.seats.map((seats, index) => ) }
Seat No Full Name Sex Age

Contact Details

) } else{ return () } } export default BookingData;
